li.span: Output the sentence "Hello, world!" on the terminal window.
Output the sentence "Hello, XXX!" on the terminal window in the next line. XXX can be words of your own choice.

Output the sentence "Hello, world!" in a different language of your choice on the terminal window in the next line, e.g. "全世界，大家好！" (Greetings in Chinese). You may make use of google translate to get different translations.

problem.p: Notice that all three sentences should be output in the same execution of the program.

p.b: You will only need to write the code within the curly braces of the main method, as indicated by the area between the dashed lines.

ol.li: Inclusion of the main method declaration when submitting the code.
Missing space or incorrect letter case in the output messages.
Misspell of System as system. The first letter should be a capital letter "S" instead of a small letter "s". System is a class in Java.
Misspell of println as printIn. The second to the last letter should be a small letter "L" instead of a capital letter "I".
